overview:
T.J. Kelly is a Vice President within Edelman Digital. Based in Edelmanâ€™s San Francisco office, T.J. is responsible for strategy and execution working closely with his talented team to support all digital initiatives across the integrated eBay account.

T.J. has a passion for digital and its means for activation and engagement across the clientâ€™s entire business. He has standout success in designing and executing initiatives that drive dynamic gains in revenue and competitive position. T.J. is a high-energy, results-driven leader with positive, upbeat approach, passion for success and thorough understanding of digital and non-digital marketing, media and engagement concepts.

His more than 15 years of experience includes developing and executing marketing strategies and digital campaigns in a wide range of industries, including media, technology, sports, travel, mortgage banking and real estate for companies such as eBay, Anheuser-Busch, AT&T, Gatorade, Puma, Nike, New Balance, Mountain Dew, E*TRADE, LIVESTRONG, Chase, FRS, Under Armour, Freestyle USA and Looksmart. His experience spans diverse sectors and startup to Fortune 500 arenas on both client and agency side in B2B and B2C environments.

Having grown up in Squaw Valley, California, near Lake Tahoe, T.J. is passionate about free skiing, water skiing, mountain biking, cycling and hockey. He also is an enthusiastic sports fan who can be seen on the sidelines of triathlons, marathons, world cup ski races and major sporting events cheering on friends, amateurs and pro athletes.

T.J. holds an M.S. in business and marketing from San Francisco State University and a B.S. in business and marketing from Chico State University
